title: Sooji Uttapam || Instant Sooji Uttapam || Breakfast
content:
Breakfast recipe: Sooji Uttapam: Instant  Servings: 6 Uttapam  Uttapam is medium thickness Indian pancakes toppings with vegetables which gives you crunchiness and extra zest to the uttapam and serve with any spicy chutney, I shared chutney links in below section. This breakfast is easy to make on lazy mornings or you can make them when you are quick to go for work / when you have ample time go with instant uttapam so it won't consume your precious time. Any kind of dosa varieties/ Uttapam I like to eat them & it works out well on my lazy day ☺️  You can checkout my  uttapam with Dosa Batter and another one with bread the links shown below Onion 🥕 Uttapam Instant Bread Uttapam 😊|| Breakfast Recipe Coming to Recipe I mixed sooji and curd and set aside for 15 mins mean while I cut veggies for toppings so my time saved and served with peanut chutney. Today I prepared instant Uttapam which is delicious and easy to make recipe with spices and toppings Let's start with ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients: 1 cup = 240 gms
  • Sooji / Mumbai Rava - 1 cup
  • Curd - 2 cups ( OR fresh Greek yogurt )
  • Cumin seeds - 1 tsp
  • Salt - 1 tsp
  • Green chillies - 3 - Paste
  • Ginger - 2 tb sp - paste
Toppings:
  • Grated carrot - 1/2 cup
  • Green Bell Pepper - 1/2 cup - finely chopped
  • White Onion - 1 - medium - finely chopped
  • Cilantro / coriander leaves - 1/2 cup - chopped
Procedure:
  • In a mixing bowl add sooji and curd/ yogurt
  • Mix well and set it aside for 15 mins
  • Next add cumin seeds, green chillies paste, ginger paste and salt
  • Add 60 ml water to make batter
  • Heat tava over low to medium heat
  • Add 1 ladle batter and spread in circular motion
  • Uttapam should be medium thickness
  • Add toppings, oil & press gently with spatula so that toppings set in uttapam
  • Cover with lid upto 1/2 minute let it cook in steam
  • Flip Uttapam, When uttapam turned into brown color
  • Cook 1/2 min and Serve hot
  • Side dish for Uttapam is chutney's I shared links in below section
  • Happy cooking & enjoy your day 🙂
Step by step process shown below with pictures: Note:
  • You can customize with different toppings on Uttapam
  • Adjust spices according to taste
  • If Batter is too thick add little amount of water to make batter consistency
